instruction: Modify facial musculature from a brow-contracted expression to a Duchenne smile. Relax corrugator supercilii to remove vertical glabellar furrow (deactivate AU4). Release orbicularis oculi lid tension (reduce AU7).Relax lip pressing and upper lip tension (reduce AU24 and AU10). Activate bilateral zygomaticus major to pull lip corners upward symmetrically (strong AU12). Activate orbicularis oculi (pars orbitalis) to raise cheeks and create lower eyelid compression (AU6). Part the lips and introduce moderate mandibular drop (AU25 + AU26) to expose upper teeth. Optionally introduce mild inner brow lift (subtle AU1) to soften upper face. Keep identity, age, gender, skin tone, lighting unchanged. Modify only muscular expression parameters; do not alter pose, head shape, hair, or image style.
